channel.title: Everybeat on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Everybeat on Tristan's website

item.title: Sunday data/statistics link roundup (4/15)
item.description: Incredibly cook, dynamic real-time maps of wind patterns in the United States. (Via Flowing Data) A d3.js coding tool that updates automatically as you update the code. This is going to be really useful for beginners trying to learn about D3. Real time coding (Via Flowing Data) An interesting blog post describing why the winning algorithm in the Netflix prize hasn’t actually been implemented! It looks like it was too much of an engineering hassle.
